attributes.action: only allow PM,  Ministers, MP and Civil Servants to have the least polluting vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should ensure that they respect the EU recommendation that all cars should only emit 130g of CO2 per KM. In view of this all MPs of the present Government together with all civil servants and public bodies with the exception of the emergency services should be restricted to using vehicles that emit less than 130g of CO2. They should not be allowed to tell us what to do and then be hypercritical and do the opposite. I.E. No more 4x4 for the Prime Minister or Jags for the deputy PM
